title: bold sfx font ID
content:
I know this isn’t much to go on, but I saw this in an online comic and the creators aren’t being of much help. I’m really not very well-versed in these kinds of fonts, so any help would be appreciated. :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Moichido\_Vol.2-154.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20091011031003/http:/typophile.com/files/Moichido_Vol.2-154.png) | 47.64 KB |
author: elfee

comments.content:
from this small sample, it could be hand drawn.

But to find something near it, check out  
 [http://www.blambot.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20091011031003/http:/www.blambot.com/)

[http://www.comicbookfonts.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20091011031003/http:/www.comicbookfonts.com/)

Jason C
